mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL AS emamil, NAME AS name, ROLE AS role, CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, ROLE, PRIVACY_AGREE, REMOTE_LOGIN_AGREE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{role}, #{privacyAgree}, #{remoteLoginAgree}, NOW(), NOW());
